data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Eupen with the kick-off.
Julien Ngoy puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
It's Mechelen with the kick-off after the break.
Eupen make their first substitution with Amara Baby replacing Smail Prevljak.
In the minute 67, Jonathan Heris is replacing Adriano for the home team.
William Togui is on a sub for Onur Kaya for Mechelen.
At Kehrweg Stadium, Jordi Vanlerberghe has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 84, The away team replace Victor Wernersson with Issa Kabore.
Benat San Jose Gil (Eupen) is making a third substitution, with Konan N'Dri replacing Knowledge Musona.
Joachim Van Damme is booked for the away team.
The match has come to a close in Eupen. The final score is 1-1.
